title: Automated Trello Board Summarization with GPT-5-Nano
description:
This workflow pulls a Trello **board ‚Üí lists ‚Üí cards**, maps key fields (board, list, task names/descriptions), and asks OpenAI to **summarize the board**.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Connect Trello (Developer API)
1. Get your **API key**: https://trello.com/app-key  
2. Generate a **token** (from the same page ‚Üí **Token**), or use:  
   `https://trello.com/1/authorize?expiration=never&name=n8n&scope=read,write&response_type=token&key=YOUR_API_KEY`  
3. In n8n ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New ‚Üí Trello API**, paste **API Key** and **Token**, save.  
4. Open each Trello node (**Get Board**, **Get Lists**, **Get Cards**) and select your Trello credential.

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Set Up OpenAI
1. Create an API key: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys  
2. (If needed) Add billing: https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/billing/overview  
3. In n8n ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New ‚Üí OpenAI**, paste your key, save.  
4. In the **OpenAI Chat Model** node, pick your credential and model (e.g., `gpt-5-nano`).

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ Add Your Board URL to ‚ÄúGet Board‚Äù
1. Copy your Trello board URL (e.g., `https://trello.com/b/DCpuJbnd/administrative-tasks`).  
2. Open the **Get Board** node ‚Üí **Resource: Board**, **Operation: Get**.  
3. In **ID**, choose **URL** mode and paste the **board URL**.  
   - The node will resolve the board and output its `id` ‚Üí used by **Get Lists** / **Get Cards**.

---

## ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Run
- Click **Execute Workflow**.  
- The final **Summarize Tasks** step returns a concise board summary.

---
